entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 3:00 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: ESE 35 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow and ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
